To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: This recording features a conversation between radio host, Eddie Hill and Hank Snow. Red Foley and Roy Acuff call in but the conversation is one-sided and only Hill and Snow's side of the conversation can be heard. The recording includes the two discussing Snow's life, career, and music. Hill does announce songs that were played in real time but are not included on this recording. The tape is dated April of 1957. This tape is the fourth for the Eddie Hill Show and conversation has been carried over from the third tape. This tape is forty-seven of an unidentified number of tapes.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
